channel.title: Project Flawless [508/525]
channel.description:
[center][b][size=18pt]Project Flawless[/size] [508/525][/b][/center] [img]http://img33.imageshack.us/img33/6321/surviveq.png[/img] Hey, so project's name is all what I want to do.
[b]Flawless[/b] -PvP, -PvN, -Less-Lag (removing pointless things), -Economy -Skilling -interfaces -etc etc...
[size=18pt][b]Features:[/b][/size] [b]ANTI-DDOS Protection Perfect prayer drain Perfect hits on NPCs- based on npc defence level your attack/attack bonus Custom Points for Xp Exchange shop [img]http://img405.imageshack.us/img405/2830/23044316.jpg[/img]
[color=black][size=18pt]-Bored of getting hitted for 40+?, even if you are in maxed defence???,or bored of hitting 30s+ on corp with 1 attack pure??? - that (in real RS impossibles) happens on most 508s+, so i've made my own PvN system working 100%![/size][/color] Custom Character statics [size=14pt]showing your Stats Versus NPCS[/size] [img]http://img686.imageshack.us/img686/8619/meleedef.jpg[/img] [img]http://img514.imageshack.us/img514/6066/rangee.jpg[/img] [img]http://img257.imageshack.us/img257/7532/81676656.jpg[/img] -no more getting 0prayed after 5 sec with Attack/def/str pray on. [/b] [img]http://img175.imageshack.us/img175/9673/rul.jpg[/img] [img]http://img406.imageshack.us/img406/2177/hlp.jpg[/img]
So the project is based on [b]Synestia[/b] 517 I'm looking for some serious people not for those that think when they can make themselfs admins they can be coders. Really, I want those that do have balls for it.
[center][b]Development Team Needed:[/b] [b]Server Coders: [/b]1/2 [b] Client Coders: [/b]0/1 -recommented [b]Webmasters: [/b]0/2 [b]Hoster: [/b]1/1[/center]stay as admin on server :P [size=14pt] [b]use this app. please:[/b][/size] [code]First name/nick: Old:(only 13+ Pl0x) Years/months of java: I'm good at: 314/508/525+ Position in team: S / C / W / H[/code]

item.title: Project Flawless [508/525]
item.dc:creator: @Amayzing Amayzing
item.description:
@Amayzing wrote:

First name/nick: Alex
Old:(only 13+ Pl0x): I’m fifteen years old.
Years/months of web development: I’ve been developing websites for over two and a half years now.
I’m good at what kinds of web development ‘languages’: I’m a master of HTML and CSS, know bits and pieces of PHP (I’m still in the process of learning), and I’ll be learning more MySQL this summer.
Position in team: S / C / W / H : Webmaster

Feel free to add me via MSN - Alex.amayzing@hotmail.com

Edit: I’ve already registered a Co.CC domain for the time being and set up the DNS to link to my paid web hosting, thus making the Co.CC domain act like any .Com, .Org, .Net, etc. domain name. I suppose I’ll get started even though you haven’t accepted me yet just because I’m bored. I’ll give you the link when it’s partially complete.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Flawless [508/525]
item.dc:creator: @Swift_Sk Swift Sk
item.description:
@Swift_Sk wrote:

[center][size=18pt]Project Flawless[/size] [508/525][/center]

Hey, so project’s name is all what I want to do.

Flawless
-PvP,
-PvN,
-Less-Lag (removing pointless things),
-Economy
-Skilling
-interfaces
-etc etc…

[size=18pt]Features:[/size]
[b]ANTI-DDOS Protection
Perfect prayer drain
Perfect hits on NPCs- based on npc defence level your attack/attack bonus
Custom Points for Xp Exchange shop

[color=black][size=18pt]-Bored of getting hitted for 40+?, even if you are in maxed defence???,or bored of hitting 30s+ on corp with 1 attack pure??? - that (in real RS impossibles) happens on most 508s+, so i’ve made my own PvN system working 100%![/size][/color]
Custom Character statics [size=14pt]showing your Stats Versus NPCS[/size]



-no more getting 0prayed after 5 sec with Attack/def/str pray on.
[/b]

So the project is based on Synestia 517
I’m looking for some serious people not for those that think when they can make themselfs admins they can be coders. Really, I want those that do have balls for it.

[center]Development Team Needed:
Server Coders: 1/2
Client Coders: 0/1 -recommented
Webmasters: 0/2
Hoster: 1/1[/center]stay as admin on server
[size=14pt]
use this app. please:[/size]
